name: Elite Sniper the Contract to Kill
name_original: Elite Sniper the Contract to Kill
description:
Elite Sniper the Contract to Kill

This is a FPS game, a shooting game for your entertainment.

Elite Sniper the Contract to Kill team must eliminate the thread by fire all the enemies, which is the terrorist team.

"Weapons lovers will be happy to see a large arsenal of different guns and explosives to use in missions…”
Betrayed and left for dead on the battlefield, you must build your team of mercenaries and exact a war of revenge against your enemies.
Grab your gun and prepare for epic warfare and furious FPS action! Show no mercy to the alien army, and take back your planet!
like shotguns, Ak-47, and machine-guns from different places during action.
It is not just a regular fire game, you will now learn how to use different guns and shoot fast, before you even start think.

If you play well, grenades are available as well. Have fun and protect the country! This shooting game will discover your new task!

Key features:

=> simple,operation, touch whole screen operation, changeable control sensivity.
=> realistic combat experience, rich combat action and combat sound
=> Thrilling First Person Shooter Game
=> Best Shooting Game
=> Amazing sound effects
